CHAT.comment: JAMES B. PEAKE, SECRETARY OF VETERANS AFFAIRS, Petitioner v. WOODROW F. SANDERS.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:04 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF ERIC D. MILLER ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF CHRISTOPHER J. MEADE ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT SIMMONS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF MARK R. LIPPMAN ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT SANDERS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF ERIC D. MILLER ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:03 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
